name: Negative-N
description:
Negative-N is a copy of minecraft in unity with a lot of features!

It is in developement so it's normal if this havv some bugs!

Features list:

-Take Screenshot (F2)

-Can remove the ui (F1)

-Snick

-Caves

-Ores

If you want to get screenshots:

If your in windows:

Go to "C:\User\\AppData\LocalLow\killar_exe\Negative-N\Sceenshots"
